answers.author: Chase Carlile
answers.text:
According the the City of Kent, Ohio's website, the standing rules of the City Council lists the parliamentarian as the city clerk.  The current city clerk became a certified parliamentarian in 2003.  I was unable to find any specific duties or guidlines listed on the website, but you can contact the city clerk at 330-678-8007 for more information.
